verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word,<s%> you <S%H6510>cows<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> that are in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> which <S%H6231>oppress<s%> the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> which <S%H7533>crush<s%> the <S%H34>needy,<s%> which <S%H559>say<s%> to their <S%H113>masters,<s%> <S%H935>Bring,<s%> and let us <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by his <S%H6944>holiness,<s%> that, <S%H2009>see,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> on you, that he will <S%H5375>take<s%> you away with <S%H6793>hooks,<s%> and your <S%H319>posterity<s%> with <S%H5518>fishhooks<s%> <S%H1729><s%>.

And you shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out at the <S%H6556>breaches,<s%> <S%H802>every<s%> cow at that which is <S%H5048>before<s%> her; and you shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> them into the <S%H2038>palace,<s%> <S%H5001>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H935>Come<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H6586>transgress;<s%> at <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H6586>transgression;<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> every <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and your <S%H4643>tithes<s%> after <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>years:<s%>

And <S%H6999>offer<s%> a sacrifice of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> with <S%H2557>leaven,<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> and <S%H8085>publish<s%> the <S%H5071>free<s%> offerings: for <S%H3651>this<s%> <S%H157>likes<s%> you, O you <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5001>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And I <S%H1571>also<s%> have <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H5356>cleanness<s%> of <S%H8127>teeth<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H2640>want<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4725>places:<s%> yet have you not <S%H7725>returned<s%> to me, <S%H5001>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H1571>also<s%> I have <S%H4513>withheld<s%> the <S%H1653>rain<s%> from you, when there were <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> to the <S%H7105>harvest:<s%> and I caused it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and caused it not to <S%H4305>rain<s%> on <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H5892>city:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> piece was <S%H4305>rained<s%> on, and the piece <S%H834>whereupon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> it <S%H4305>rained<s%> not <S%H3001>withered.<s%>

So <S%H8147>two<s%> or <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5128>wandered<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water;<s%> but they were not <S%H7646>satisfied:<s%> yet have you not <S%H7725>returned<s%> to me, <S%H5001>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

I have <S%H5221>smitten<s%> you with <S%H7711>blasting<s%> and <S%H3420>mildew:<s%> when your <S%H1593>gardens<s%> and your <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and your <S%H8384>fig<s%> trees and your <S%H2132>olive<s%> trees <S%H7235>increased,<s%> the <S%H1501>palmerworm<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%> them: yet have you not <S%H7725>returned<s%> to me, <S%H5001>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> among you the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> after the <S%H1870>manner<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> your <S%H970>young<s%> men have I <S%H2026>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and have <S%H7628>taken<s%> <S%H7628>away<s%> your <S%H5483>horses;<s%> and I have made the <S%H889>stink<s%> of your <S%H4264>camps<s%> to <S%H5927>come<s%> up to your <S%H639>nostrils:<s%> yet have you not <S%H7725>returned<s%> to me, <S%H5001>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

I have <S%H2015>overthrown<s%> some of you, as <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4114>overthrew<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> and you were as a <S%H181>firebrand<s%> <S%H5337>plucked<s%> out of the <S%H8316>burning:<s%> yet have you not <S%H7725>returned<s%> to me, <S%H5001>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> will I <S%H6213>do<s%> to you, O <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H6118>because<s%> <S%H3588><s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> to you, <S%H3559>prepare<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For, <S%H2009>see,<s%> he that <S%H3335>forms<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H1254>creates<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and <S%H5046>declares<s%> to <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is his <S%H7808>thought,<s%> that <S%H6213>makes<s%> the <S%H7837>morning<s%> <S%H5890>darkness,<s%> and <S%H1869>treads<s%> on the <S%H1116>high<s%> places of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> is his <S%H8034>name.<s%>
